hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas:"When the Prophet commanded the two who were engaging in Li'an to utter the fifth oath, he commanded a man to place his hand over his mouth, and he said: "It will inevitably bring the punishment upon the liar

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَمْرِ بِوَضْعِ الْيَدِ عَلَى فِي الْمُتَلاَعِنَيْنِ عِنْدَ الْخَامِسَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Command To Place The Hand Over The Mouth Of The Two Who Are Engaging In Li'an When They Utter Th
